title: What are the best three songs since the year 2000? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sólstafir - Fjara (2011) Seldom have I heard the anguish of a broken heart done so perfectly in a song. And you don’t have to understand a word of Icelandic (I don’t) to feel what this is about. A genre of its own and a song in its own class.  Witchcraft - Deconstruction (2012) Legend is in my opinion one of the best rock albums in history, if it had been made in the 70s it would have been legendary in reputation as well. This incarnation of Witchcraft had the perfect musicians to complement Magnus Pelander's quirky genius. This song has everything I want in a song: Evocative lyrics, great rhythm, diverse and tempo’s, great guitar work and solo’s.  The Temperance Movement - Pride (2013) What a song, it’s like the best parts of the 70s and 90s reincarnated into this band. From the longing start of the song with these sweet vocals to the power and raw emotion in the climaxes this song takes you on a journey.

I think it is all about personal opinions and choices.So here I am writing mine.(All belongs to Hindi Films because I love their lyrics) 1. Abhi much mein kahin (Sonu Nigam -Agneepath) 2.Maula mere le le Meri jaan(Chak de India) 3. Papa(Akhil Sachdeva ) My Daddy is not with me so I love the third one because I can think about our past memories. Miss u Daddy.
